mapper.select: SELECT ty_Lgroup FROM problem_type WHERE ty_grade = #{ty_grade} GROUP BY ty_Lgroup;
SELECT ty_Mgroup FROM problem_type WHERE ty_Lgroup = #{ty_Lgroup} GROUP BY ty_Mgroup;
SELECT ty_level , ty_no FROM problem_type WHERE ty_Mgroup = #{ty_Mgroup} GROUP BY ty_level;
SELECT * FROM problem WHERE p_delYN = 'N' AND ty_no = #{ty_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer_student (p_no, s_no, a_s_answer) VALUES (#{p_no}, #{s_no}, #{a_s_answer})
mapper.select: SELECT an.a_s_no , st.s_name, pt.ty_grade, pt.ty_Lgroup , pt.ty_Mgroup , pt.ty_level, an.a_s_answer AS '학생 답안' , pr.p_answ AS '모범 답안', case when an.a_s_answer = pr.p_answ then '정답' ELSE '오답' END AS '정답 유무' FROM answer_student AS an INNER JOIN student_user AS st ON (an.s_no = st.s_no) INNER JOIN problem AS pr ON (an.p_no = pr.p_no) INNER JOIN problem_type AS pt ON (pr.ty_no = pt.ty_no) WHERE an.s_no = #{an.s_no};

SELECT an.a_s_no , st.s_name, DATE_FORMAT(an.a_s_date, '%Y-%m-%d (%H시)' ) AS '시험 날짜' , SUM(case when an.a_s_answer = pr.p_answ then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS '정답 갯수', COUNT(pr.p_no) AS '총 문제 갯수' FROM answer_student AS an INNER JOIN student_user AS st ON (an.s_no = st.s_no) INNER JOIN problem AS pr ON (an.p_no = pr.p_no) WHERE an.s_no = 1;
